name: Pawndamonium (OSTJam)
description:
Charge through a swarm of pawns in this chess-based twist on tower defense. Work to fortify your back line while protecting against wave after wave of pawns and other chess pieces.

This game was made during the OSTJam in January of 2021.

Music used:
  • Peter Chang - Xenon
  • Track - Digital Forest
  • Inkedsplat - Garuna
